channel.title: briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesPoliticsOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Americans' trust in key federal agencies hits record lows
item.description: Data: Gallup; Chart: Jacque Schrag/Axios Americans' approval ratings for six major federal agencies — FEMA , CIA, CDC , FDA, EPA and the IRS — have dr...

item.title: How nuclear startups are using side products to chase profit
item.description: The road to futuristic nuclear power is long and paved with … cancer drugs? The big picture : Several nuclear startups are pursuing profits on offshoo...

item.title: How Chicago became ground zero for Trump's military crackdown
item.description: Chicago has become the ultimate proving ground for President Trump's domestic military experiment , pitting armed federal forces against a Democratic-...

item.title: 2019 emails boost White House's view that furloughed workers aren't guaranteed back pay
item.description: The White House isn't just standing by its view that federal law doesn't guarantee back pay for furloughed workers: It has emails showing this belief ...

item.title: Housing is outpacing population growth, but there's a catch
item.description: Data: U.S. Census Bureau; Note: 2020 values are estimated; Chart: Axios Visuals Nationwide housing growth outpaced population gains over the last deca...

item.title: Congresswoman-in-limbo Adelita Grijalva on the dilemma she faces
item.description: Democratic Rep. Grijalva won her special election more than two weeks ago, but House Republicans refuse to swear her into office.

item.title: Tracking who Trump is appointing to fill key administration roles
item.description: Follow President Trump’s progress filling over 800 positions, among about 1,300 that require Senate confirmation, in this tracker from The Washington ...

item.title: Trump wants a Nobel Prize. He’ll learn Friday if his campaign paid off.
item.description: President Donald Trump’s long quest for a Nobel Peace Prize has sparked an unusual global scramble.

item.title: Texas National Guard troops are active in Chicago area, military says
item.description: Around 200 Texas National Guard soldiers and 300 soldiers from the Illinois National Guard will protect ICE agents and federal property, the military ...

item.title: Trump announces ceasefire deal to begin ending the war in Gaza
item.description: The president’s announcement says the agreement includes the release of hostages by Hamas and the withdrawal of Israeli troops.

item.title: Trump's approval holds steady despite unpopular policies, per new NYT poll
item.description: Trump’s strength with Republicans on the economy could prove to be a boon for the GOP.

item.title: New poll reveals warning signs for Trump with Latino voters
item.description: A survey from the liberal-leaning group Somos Votantes shows Latino voters are souring on the president.

item.title: Trump is selling a strong economy. Voters aren’t buying it.
item.description: Privately, aides concede voters remain uneasy about prices but argue their policies are beginning to turn things around.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
